document.full_text: boston red sox closer jonathan papelbon will appeal a three-game suspension handed down by major league baseball on tuesday after the fiery pitcher was ejected from a game against oakland.
document.title: boston closer papelbon appeals three-game suspension
lines_and_colors: boston red sox closer jonathan papelbon will appeal a three-game suspension handed down by major league baseball on tuesday after the fiery pitcher was ejected from a game against oakland.
